scenario_text.value:
No, how could—Why is this in a place like
this?!

Yes, it is. See here? There’s a sticker with
my name on it.
Oh yeah... Well, here you go.

This is a CD of a classic rock band that my
father gave to me.

He’d recommended other music to me, but for
some reason these are the only songs I liked.
Well yes... It’s a favorite of mine.

The lyrics says, “Fear not the path you’ve
chosen, those who hinder you are frozen.”

That stuck in my head... Hee hee, I know it
sounds kind of dark.

Um, at any rate, thank you for finding it,
Takuma!
